document.full_text: adobe systems inc posted first-quarter profit above wall street estimates, but the world's biggest maker of design software cut its second-quarter revenue outlook by $50 million, citing uncertain business environment in japan following the earthquake.
document.title: adobe's q2 view shaken by japan quake fallout
lines_and_colors: adobe systems inc posted first-quarter profit above wall street estimates, but the world's biggest maker of design software cut its second-quarter revenue outlook by $50 million, citing uncertain business environment in japan following the earthquake.
